CatDescriptText: Mr. William A. Pryor, 2435 Centre Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that high school students should strike in order to air grievances or to gain their objectives?"  Answer reads: "No, I don't. High school children should come under the discipline of a teacher."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of William A. Pryor wearing dark fedora, small moustache, and light colored overcoat, holding box that reads "Fox Coat & Suit Co., Inc. 312 Seventh Avenue New York 18, NY", standing in front of stone building with store window on left
